title: I CANT GIFT :(
body: I wanted to gift my bro a skin for his birthday but when I went to the store there was not the little gift button next to the +RP button :( . Can someone tell me why is this happening?

replies.body: That's strange, I was able to see it just fine on mine.  Are you still having this issue?  If so, can you also provide a screenshot?  I'd like to help out so your brother can have a cool birthday!
